UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Generation of antimicrobial peptides Leg1 and Leg2 from chickpea storage protein, active against food spoilage bacteria and foodborne pathogens.
Literature.Author: Heymich M-L, Friedlein U, Trollmann M, Schwaiger K, Böckmann RA, Pischetsrieder M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli NEB5alpha(MIC=62.5µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=15.6µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 35150(MIC=500µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 13452(MIC=125µM),Listeria monocytogenes SLCC 5581(MIC=500µM),Listeria monocytogenes(MIC=250µM),Salmonella typhimurium DSM 19587(MIC=>1000µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium DSM 554(MIC=1000µM),Staphylococcus aureus DSM 2569(MIC=500µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 3300(MIC=500µM),Bacillus cereus DSM 4222(MIC=1000µM),Bacillus cereus DSM 4312(MIC=>1000µM),Clostridium perfringens ATCC 13124(MIC=125µM),Clostridium perfringens DSM 11784(MIC=>1000µM),Escherichia coli NEB5alpha(MBC=125µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MBC=15.6µM),Pseudomonas putida DSM 291(MIC=125µM),Pseudomonas fluorescens DSM 50124(MIC=500µM)
